thread.title: Donald Trump Wants To Kick Out More Immigrants!
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Wants To Kick Out More Immigrants!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Donald Trump Wants To Kick Out More Immigrants!

organizations.name: direct phone numbers of white house

text:
1/31/2017 10:20 PM ET | Filed under: Politik • Donald Trump 
The worst is yet to come… 
On Tuesday, The Washington Post obtained documents that suggest Donald Trump is considering a plan to deny entry to immigrants who would require public assistance. In addition, the businessman may also kick out U.S.-living immigrants who rely heavily on taxpayer dollars. 
Related: Direct Phone Numbers Of White House Staff Have Been Leaked 
Essentially, the President wants to control who receives visas based on how many resources they will use from the American economy. The focus of these orders is to protect domestic workers and their jobs. 
As of this writing, the documents are solely circulating among officials, and there is no word whether Trump is going to move forward with these actions or not. 
The White House would neither confirm nor deny the existence of such documents, and did not issue a statement. 
In addition to his Muslim ban, it's very obvious the businessman wants to significantly restrict all forms of immigration to the United States. 
To read the draft executive orders, CLICK HERE .
